description: Stateproof api calls with valid transaction ID but not enough signature files
extendedDescription: There is only one node with the signature file 2019-10-11T13_33_25.526889Z.rcd_sig, so even though the
transaction's record file is found, the number of signature files found can't prove its consensus.

messages.message: Require at least 1/3 signature files to prove consensus, got 1 out of 4 for file 2019-10-11T13_33_25.526889Z.rcd_sig
